verbs.description: [ARG0: astros] [V: set] [ARG2: to meet red sox in alcs] the red sox beat the yankees 4 - 3 on tuesday night winning their american league division series in four games and advancing to the american league championship series against houston game 1 is scheduled for 7 09 p m saturday night at fenway park houston astros houston boston red sox alex cora astros cleveland indians progressive field fenway park american league cleveland red sox american league division series tony kemp
